original_title: Since Our Status Changed... (I'm Alone But At Least I'm Not Being Kicked In The Face)
overview: SINCE OUR STATUS CHANGED ... chronicles a breakup. The film mixes animated oil painting with shot footage. Charles Frayne Prize Winner, Ann Arbor Film Festival, Best Animated Feature, 1993.
title: Since Our Status Changed... (I'm Alone But At Least I'm Not Being Kicked In The Face)
